text:
One cannot extend EjbJar to apply to other appservers (or to modify code used 
for a particular appserver).  This is because there is no protected accessor to 
the deploymentTools private variable.  So overriding createBorland is to no 
avail because the deploymentTools variable which is used by execute() is 
unavailable.  

The only other alternative is to override the execute method of EjbJar and 
rewrite a great deal of code.

So I'd suggest adding a method to EjbJar:

protected List getDeploymentTools() {
    return deploymentTools;
}
creator: tamm@alum.mit.edu
